page.description: Minimizes the main Alpha Five program window.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.MINIMIZE() method causes a window to fill the screen.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example loads, displays, and minimizes the Customer Information form window.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.minimize()
